Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>; praise<S>1984</S> him, O ye servants<S>5650</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Ye that stand<S>5975</S> in the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, in the courts<S>2691</S> of the house<S>1004</S> of our God<S>430</S>,
Praise<S>1984</S> the LORD<S>3050</S>; for the LORD<S>3068</S> is good<S>2896</S>: sing praises<S>2167</S> unto his name<S>8034</S>; for it is pleasant<S>5273</S>.
For the LORD<S>3050</S> hath chosen<S>977</S> Jacob<S>3290</S> unto himself, and Israel<S>3478</S> for his peculiar treasure<S>5459</S>.
For I know<S>3045</S> that the LORD<S>3068</S> is great<S>1419</S>, and that our Lord<S>113</S> is above all gods<S>430</S>.
Whatsoever the LORD<S>3068</S> pleased<S>2654</S>, that did<S>6213</S> he in heaven<S>8064</S>, and in earth<S>776</S>, in the seas<S>3220</S>, and all deep places<S>8415</S>.
He causeth the vapours<S>5387</S> to ascend<S>5927</S> from the ends<S>7097</S> of the earth<S>776</S>; he maketh<S>6213</S> lightnings<S>1300</S> for the rain<S>4306</S>; he bringeth<S>3318</S> the wind<S>7307</S> out of his treasuries<S>214</S>.
Who smote<S>5221</S> the firstborn<S>1060</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S>, both of man<S>120</S> and beast<S>929</S>. <sup>both: Heb. from man unto beast</sup>
Who sent<S>7971</S> tokens<S>226</S> and wonders<S>4159</S> into the midst<S>8432</S> of thee, O Egypt<S>4714</S>, upon Pharaoh<S>6547</S>, and upon all his servants<S>5650</S>.
Who smote<S>5221</S> great<S>7227</S> nations<S>1471</S>, and slew<S>2026</S> mighty<S>6099</S> kings<S>4428</S>;
Sihon<S>5511</S> king<S>4428</S> of the Amorites<S>567</S>, and Og<S>5747</S> king<S>4428</S> of Bashan<S>1316</S>, and all the kingdoms<S>4467</S> of Canaan<S>3667</S>:
And gave<S>5414</S> their land<S>776</S> for an heritage<S>5159</S>, an heritage<S>5159</S> unto Israel<S>3478</S> his people<S>5971</S>.
Thy name<S>8034</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, endureth for ever<S>5769</S>; and thy memorial<S>2143</S>, O LORD<S>3068</S>, throughout all<S>1755</S> generations<S>1755</S>. <sup>throughout: Heb. to generation and generation</sup>
For the LORD<S>3068</S> will judge<S>1777</S> his people<S>5971</S>, and he will repent<S>5162</S> himself concerning his servants<S>5650</S>.
The idols<S>6091</S> of the heathen<S>1471</S> are silver<S>3701</S> and gold<S>2091</S>, the work<S>4639</S> of men's<S>120</S> hands<S>3027</S>.
They have mouths<S>6310</S>, but they speak<S>1696</S> not; eyes<S>5869</S> have they, but they see<S>7200</S> not;
They have ears<S>241</S>, but they hear<S>238</S> not; neither is there<S>3426</S> any breath<S>7307</S> in their mouths<S>6310</S>.
They that make<S>6213</S> them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth<S>982</S> in them.
Bless<S>1288</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, O house<S>1004</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: bless<S>1288</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, O house<S>1004</S> of Aaron<S>175</S>:
Bless<S>1288</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, O house<S>1004</S> of Levi<S>3878</S>: ye that fear<S>3373</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>, bless<S>1288</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Blessed<S>1288</S> be the LORD<S>3068</S> out of Zion<S>6726</S>, which dwelleth<S>7931</S> at Jerusalem<S>3389</S>. Praise<S>1984</S> ye the LORD<S>3050</S>.
